input_data.title: Bosch: Legacy
input_data.overview: Bosch is now making a living as a private investigator two years after he quit the LAPD and finds himself working with one time enemy and top-notch attorney Honey “Money” Chandler. Meanwhile, Bosch's daughter Maddie is venturing into the world of the LAPD.

response.analytical_summary: Bosch: Legacy continues the legacy of Harry Bosch, now operating as a private investigator while navigating a new chapter in his life. The series blends crime procedural elements with a focus on character development and familial relationships, particularly as his daughter, Maddie, joins the LAPD. It explores themes of justice, redemption, and the complexities of law enforcement, maintaining a gritty and realistic tone while offering a compelling narrative driven by Bosch's unwavering pursuit of truth. The show offers a mature and nuanced exploration of morality and the consequences of past actions.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: Following his departure from the LAPD, Harry Bosch establishes himself as a private investigator, initially struggling to adapt to the lack of structure and resources. He unexpectedly finds himself collaborating with Honey “Money” Chandler, a skilled attorney with whom he has a complicated history. Their cases often intertwine, forcing them to confront their shared past and navigate the murky waters of Los Angeles’ criminal underworld. Simultaneously, Bosch’s daughter, Maddie, begins her career with the LAPD, facing the challenges and dangers of police work while grappling with her father’s legacy. As Maddie progresses in her career, she uncovers secrets and faces moral dilemmas that test her commitment to the force. Harry’s past continues to haunt him, resurfacing in unexpected ways and threatening to derail his new life. The series explores the ongoing repercussions of his past actions and the lengths he will go to protect his family and seek justice, even when it means confronting powerful enemies and risking everything he has built.
response.keyword_sentence: Bosch: Legacy is a gritty and realistic crime drama set in Los Angeles, following an ex-cop turned private investigator as he navigates a complex world of justice, family, and the lingering consequences of his past.
